title: Patch 9
content: Hits. Male Gith no longer fire two projectiles on their first shot with a two-handed crossbow. Eldritch Knights and Arcane Tricksters can now replace a spell at Level 4. Off-screen characters can no longer be hit by spells. Throwing weapons Dipped in fire at explosive barrels now makes them explode. Concentration effects and conditions granted by certain items no longer remain active if you switch to a different item. The turrets at the Sel√ªnite Outpost now respect the rules of combat.
